text: Locker type (metal, phenolic, HDPE, laminate) and configuration matches architectural specs & shop drawings
Color, finish, and accessories (benches, bases, end panels, numbers) match submittals
Locking system (padlock, built-in combo, key) matches project requirement and is operational
Wall and floor surface flat, level, and ready for locker mounting
Blocking/backing installed if required for wall-mounted or cantilever units
Power/data provisions confirmed (if electronic lock system is used)
Lockers installed level, aligned, and anchored securely to floor/wall
Doors open/close freely with no obstruction, rubbing, or misalignment
Gaps between rows, banks, or partitions consistent and compliant with manufacturer tolerances
Built-in locks functional and keyed alike (if specified); number plates installed in sequence
Benches installed securely, centered, and finished to match locker materials
Wall hooks, shoe compartments, coat rods installed as required
Locker toe-kicks or recessed bases installed flush with finished floor
Units free from dents, paint chips, scratches, or damaged edges
Lockers cleaned inside and out, dust/debris removed
Consultant walkthrough completed and signoff obtained

id: • NAAMM/HMMA 130-12, ADA/CSA B651 for bench heights, ASTM A1008 / A167
• Manufacturer Specs: Penco, List Industries, Scranton, Lyon, Tufftec, Hollman
